issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

resolution.description: The problem is a duplicate of an existing issue.
resolution.name: Duplicate

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

components.name: Appcelerator CLI
components.description: Please enter tickets related to Tooling and the CLI here

fields.description:
I switched to HFS+ Case Sensitive on my Mac and titanium was not able to build my iOs projects (Android one are just fine). That's the error message:

no such file or directory '/Users/lele/Library/Application Support/Titanium/mobilesdk/osx/3.0.0.GA/iphone/Resources'

I found that in "/Users/lele/Library/Application Support/Titanium/mobilesdk/osx/3.0.0.GA/iphone/" folder i have a "resources". Symlinking Resources -> resources  did the trick and now i'm able to build again. I've done a fast search on github to find the faulty build script but i failed... so here's a bug ticket.
fields.summary: Case Sensitive HFS on OSX causes build failure
fields.environment:
Mountain Lion OSX 10.8.2
Titanium CLI version 3.0.22
File System HFS+ Case Sensitive

comments.body: This was fixed in TIMOB-12375 and released in 3.0.2.GA.
